attention_detonators.content: Is your screen staring back at you? You're not lazy, you're in Error Code: Executive Shutdown.
Your brain isn't broken. Your Prefrontal Cortex is in a neural gridlock with your Amygdala. We're sending a tow truck.

EEAT_firewalls: Dr. Russell Barkley's seminal work establishes that such 'freezes' are a profound failure of executive self-regulation, not a lack of willpower.

Neuroimaging studies by Castellanos et al. suggest a delay in the maturation of the prefrontal cortex, the very region needed to break this paralysis, explains why it's a persistent neurobiological issue.
